channel.title: CVE Feed for I Thirteen Web Solution -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for I Thirteen Web Solution -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-47600|2024-08-03T14:55:08.455Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- mass%20email%20to%20users
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Mass Email To users plugin <= 1.1.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-46799|2024-08-03T14:39:38.704Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- easy%20testimonial%20slider%20and%20form
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Easy Testimonial Slider and Form plugin <= 1.0.15 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27960|2024-08-02T00:41:55.886Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- email%20subscription%20popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Email Subscription Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Email Subscription Popup: from n/a through 1.2.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-27989|2024-08-02T00:41:56.014Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- wp%20responsive%20tabs%20horizontal%20vertical%20and%20accordion%20tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs: from n/a through 1.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-30497|2024-07-05T17:22:21.987Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- wp%20responsive%20tabs%20horizontal%20vertical%20and%20accordion%20tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs.This issue affects WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs: from n/a through 1.1.17.
